nodes.text: Bryce Agoris was an Alderaanian member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and a lieutenant within the Infiltrator branch. Shortly before the Battle of Endor, Agoris defected and, along with his friends and freelance operative Myrgaanti Shi-Iki, stole the VGK-3 Shooting Star class starfighter prototype which they named the Warhog.
